description:
Campsite breakfasts, beach afternoons, and lying back to watch the Perseid meteor shower. This packable waterproof mat has your days, nights, and seats covered, and it’s nice-looking to boot. Unroll it for a dry place to sit on dewy mornings or put it under your tent as protection against wet or rocky ground. And if the wind picks up? Batten down the hatches by putting stakes through the corner loops, and keep picnicking, playing or listening to the breeze in the trees.

  • DWR-treated faux suede top surface
  • Lightweight and rolls up neatly
  • Underside is tested to 5000mm waterproofness
  • Paracord edge loops let you stake it down (stakes not included, but sticks will work in a pinch)
name: Rumpl The Everywhere Mat
